Address.label: Address
Address.value: NO. 8 XINYUAN S. ROAD,8TH FLOOR, QIHAO PLAZA, BEIJING, 100027, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Weibo is the largest social media platform in China. As of 2020, Weibo had 521 million monthly active users and 225 million daily active users, many of whom are drawn there by the millions of key opinion leaders in entertainment, sports, and business circles. Sina is the major shareholder, holding 44.7% of shares and with 70.8% voting power; Alibaba holds 29.8% of shares and 15.7% voting power.
